meaningMnemonic:
When you <kanji>awake</kanji> to a moment of total <kanji>comprehension</kanji>, you've achieved <vocabulary>mental readiness</vocabulary>. You have the <vocabulary>resolution</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>determination</vocabulary> to face any challenge now.

覚悟 refers to mentally preparing yourself to face a difficult situation or accept an unfavorable outcome. It conveys a sense of strong determination and readiness to confront risks.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
